title: Neelam-Emerald Nakshi Bead Haaram - A Timeless South Indian Treasure
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) accents. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This striking haaram features three strands of meticulously strung sapphire beads, separated by CZ-studded gold spacers for a touch of brilliance. The central pendant showcases exquisite Nakshi work, with intricate floral and leaf motifs surrounding a captivating emerald. Five delicate, tear-drop CZ danglers provide elegant movement. The entire piece displays a seamless blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship with contemporary beadwork.
colors: Deep blue of the sapphire beads
and the warm yellow of the 22K gold create a vibrant and sophisticated color palette. The sparkling white of the CZ stones adds a touch of modern glamour.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and modern celebrations.
description: This haaram represents a harmonious fusion of tradition and modernity. The rich symbolism of the emerald (prosperity and growth) combined with the regal blue of sapphires makes it an auspicious piece. The meticulous Nakshi craftsmanship reflects the heritage of South Indian jewelry making. The high-quality materials and durable Hyderabadi polish ensure this piece remains a cherished heirloom for generations.
